plot: Set in a 17th century Puritan village in New England, The Aegeans is a supernatural mystery that concerns the local minister's two teenage daughters as the older is led into the troubled world of the younger.
plot_en: Set in a 17th century Puritan village in New England, The Aegeans is a supernatural mystery that concerns the local minister's two teenage daughters as the older is led into the troubled world of the younger.
plot_es: Set in a 17th century Puritan village in New England, The Aegeans is a supernatural mystery that concerns the local minister's two teenage daughters as the older is led into the troubled world of the younger.
title: The Aegeans
